channel.title: Sunrise Church
channel.description: A Podcast of Sermons from Sunrise Church, a Christian Reformed Church in McMinnville OR pastored by Bill Wilton.

item.title: Episode 1: Daniel
item.description: This is where 'show notes" go if any. A brief synopsis of the 'episode' is already in the summary (visable in iTunes or other app) so here would be more extended writing. Totally optional.
